meanings.sent1: The wind howled plangently through the night, keeping me awake.
meanings.sent2: The violin played plangently, evoking a sense of sadness in the listeners.
meanings.sent3: The ghostly figure wailed plangently, scaring the unsuspecting travelers.
meanings.sent4: The old house groaned plangently as if sharing its ancient tales with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The funeral dirge echoed plangently across the empty cemetery, adding to the somber atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Expressing sorrow or grief in a loud and resonant way
meanings.sent1: The plangently crying child tugged at the heartstrings of all who heard.
meanings.sent2: Her plangently sad song brought tears to the eyes of the audience.
meanings.sent3: The plangently painted clown face seemed out of place at the joyful party.
meanings.sent4: The plangently colored sky mirrored the deep sadness in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The plangently written poem captured the essence of loss and longing in every line.
